name: Ant
description: ant photography is one of the most skilled photography.  I used sony camera and microlance to take this picture. it took me 2 hours to take this picture .I took this picture on February 2nd from inside Sundarbans.The photo received a national response and won an award from the   Wildlife Photography Association, a symbol of the online world. The picture shows two ant fighting each other

name: Attacking
description: This is a hunting photography in which a hunter hunts a deer in this picture. A hunter hunts a deer. I used sony camera and zoom lance to take this picture.  It is an illegal hunting process we all should take proper action against poaching and the government should take action on this matter should be looked at.

name: Penguine
description: This is a penguin photography where some photographers come to the penguins kingdom with their camera and various equipment to photograph the penguins.For these pictures they used Sony camera which got a lot of response for beautification of the picture.This photo came first in an online based photography competition and won the Photography Award as an award. In this film, the beauty of penguins has been shown in a wonderful way
